examples.korean: She can be as stubborn as a mule. 발음듣기 그녀는 지독하게 고집을 부리기도[고집불통이 되기도] 한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She can be as stubborn as a mule. 발음

examples.korean: She’s a difficult horse to handle. 발음듣기 그 말은 부리기 힘든 말이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She’s a difficult horse to handle. 발음

examples.korean: He is getting quite silly in his old age. 발음듣기 그는 늙어가면서 망령을 부리기 시작한다. Friendict Level English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He is getting quite silly in his old age. 발음

examples.korean: Robert sat on his behind today. 발음듣기 로버트는 오늘 농땡이 부리기로 작정했다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Robert sat on his behind today. 발음

examples.korean: When he passed away at his home in Wisconsin, the United States on September 9, his family decided to joke back. 발음듣기 그가 미국 위스콘신의 자택에서 9월 9일 세상을 떠났을 때 그의 가족은 익살을 부리기로 결정했다. Neungyule
examples.english: When he passed away at his home in Wisconsin, the United States on September 9, his family decided to joke back. 발음
